body: Hey guys i got recommended to use quicktime player to record because it doesnt have a watermark and its free. I downloaded it you have to buy pro edition :(. Any free good software to use?
body_tagged: Hey guys i got recommended to use quicktime player to record because it doesnt have a watermark and its free. I downloaded it you have to buy pro edition :(. Any free good software to use?
title: Quicktime Player Doesn't Work

replies.body: Quicktime is free and comes bundled with OS X. If you're on a Windows platform trying to download Quicktime for recording, then most likely you were mislead to another piece of software.
replies.body_tagged: Quicktime is free and comes bundled with OS X. If you're on a Windows platform trying to download Quicktime for recording, then most likely you were mislead to another piece of software.

replies.body: you can get a trial with Camtasia or something idk what its called
replies.body_tagged: you can get a trial with Camtasia or something idk what its called

replies.body: Yeah, I tried downloading QuickTime on my PC, but it had the same problem as you. It was the official website. QuickTime is wonderful on Mac. :)
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I tried downloading QuickTime on my PC, but it had the same problem as you. It was the official website. QuickTime is wonderful on Mac. :)
